name: SilkMelody (Silksong Bootleg)
description:
Silksong took too long so I DIY. It is kind of on hold now though since I'm busy now.

I took a lot of liberty in it, only copying the mechanics. The design and story are completely different from the official demo.

Hope you enjoy playing it.

Current version: v0.1.15. Has 1 boss, 2 secret health upgrades, and some enemies. Has Inventory, Journal, Map, and Save System.

There are some 3rd-party materials I used. Credits at the bottom of Github README.

Support keyboard, Xbox and PS4. There are tutorials in the game.

Keyboard
  • X - Jump.
  • Q - Silk skill
  • F - Parry
  • C - Attack
  • Z - Dash
  • V - Use tools
  • I - Open inventory

Xbox

  • A - Jump
  • X - Attack
  • B - Silk skill
  • Y - Parry
  • RT - Dash
  • LB - Use tools
  • Start - Menu

Source code repo here: https://github.com/lamnguyenkhoa/SilkMelody
